chunk_text:
STAY CONNECTED
Click the button below to join our mailing list and be the first to know when we announce our upcoming events! ### Vineyard Chapel
Have your wedding for up to 180 people in our beautiful chapel. This building is equipped with a lovely bridal suite to get ready for the big day, as well as a private room for the groomsmen. There are bathrooms, hideaway bar, and a catering kitchen all included. You can even ring the antique bell in the bell tower after the ceremony!
